EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Webinar_UK_The Cloud Native Journey Q116.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: The Cloud Native Journey Webinar today - Session link update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are sending you a friendly reminder that you are registered for our Cloud Native Journey Webinar, February 16, 2016. Please see event details below.
Please note the 'Join the Session <[[https://pivotal.webex.com/pivotal/onstage/g.php?d=645829390&t=a]]>' link is updated.
Date: February 16, 2016 Time: 10AM GMT Join the Session <[[https://pivotal.webex.com/pivotal/onstage/g.php?d=645829390&t=a]]> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
We look forward to you joining us! The Pivotal Team
